item.title: Configure remote syslog for XenServer via the command line
item.description: Citrix has some helpful documentation online about configuring remote syslog support for XenServer using the XenCenter GUI.

item.title: Log Android events remotely to a syslog server
item.description: I’m still quite pleased with my Samsung Galaxy SIII but there are some finicky Bluetooth issues with my car that I simply can’t figure out.

item.title: Piping log files to a syslog server
item.description: If you have a centralized syslog server, or you use Splunk for log tracking, you may find the need to get older log files into a syslog port on that server.
